name: NunRun
description:
A nun awakens during the night from a dream of the goddess Gauri sobbing. Her tears rain a plague of magic and creatures spawned from her sorrow come down on the kingdom. The sudden surge of magic in the land causes the gates of hell to open. Evil souls and demons take this opportunity to wreak havoc and seek to challenge Gauri's status. To do so they must find the 4 magic pearls. It is up to this sister to go off and find the pearls before they can be used for evil. 

The link below to play:

NunRun
